Title: iMust Have Locker 239
Plot: Sam and Freddie are forced to share the school's best locker after winning a contest to see how many Fat Cakes were in a jar. Meanwhile, Carly tries to get some art lessons from Spencer. Spencer teaches her about sculpting, but Carly wanted to learn how to draw a bunny after Sam and Freddie laughing at her drawing of one on iCarly.
